name: Pure Nastalgia
summary: This one of a kind gem provides you with the opportunity to sample most if not all of your favorite Super Mario Bros. games. Many of the greatest and most brilliant level designs ever invented from previous SMB titles have been selected, reimagined, and added to this unforgettable compendium to provide a brand new, fun and nostalgic experience for the family. This 38 level anthology is far more than simply a compilation as it also features custom level designs as well as hidden warp zones and coin rooms.
